column1: What's the value of following determinant $\begin{vmatrix} b + c & a - b & a \\ c + a & b - c & b \\ a + b & c - a & c \end{vmatrix}$

column4: $3\cdot a\cdot b\cdot c - a^{3} - b^{3} - c^{3}$
column5: $3\cdot a\cdot b\cdot c + a^{3} + b^{3} + c^{3}$
column8: $3\cdot a\cdot b\cdot c - a^{3} - b^{3} - c^{3}$
